name: Bread Quest 🥖🍞
description:
Game :

A game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Description :

You play as a child and your mom ask you to buy bread at town.

But he will use the power of his imagination to make this task less boring.

Have fun, and Thanks for playing my game 😉

Credits : Music :

Jules Cournut make the 2 songs for the game https://soundcloud.com/julescournut

Sound effects :

All from freesound.org
https://freesound.org/people/davilca/
https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/
https://freesound.org/people/sabotovat/
https://freesound.org/people/Fission9/

Graphics :

All tiles from https://lpc.opengameart.org/
I will try to find time to credit all the authors

Characters has been generated here https://sanderfrenken.github.io/Universal-LPC-Spritesheet-Character-Generator/
Who also take LPC arts
